text: Thomas Care Reed (born March 1, 1934)Marquis Who's Who on the Web was the 11th Secretary of the Air Force from January 2, 1976 – April 6, 1977 under Gerald Ford and Jimmy Carter.Laurie, Clayton. Leaders of the National Reconnaissance Office 1961–2001. Office of the Historian, National Reconnaissance Office. May 1, 2002. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:United States Secretaries of the Air Force Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Thomas C. Reed
